analysis.description:
cryptoWillToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/43/0x93eef2f7af419fdd079042420bb3b0ebd935228f.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/43/0x93eef2f7af419fdd079042420bb3b0ebd935228f.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/43/0x93eef2f7af419fdd079042420bb3b0ebd935228f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/43/0x93eef2f7af419fdd079042420bb3b0ebd935228f.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/43/0x93eef2f7af419fdd079042420bb3b0ebd935228f.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
